description:
In this course ' Get Rid Of Your Road Rage Using NLP and Self Hypnosis ' by Pradeep Aggarwal you will learn how to control your anger and emotions while driving a car using very simple and powerful NLP and self hypnosis techniques .

Road rage is a very common problem around the world, people tend to vent out their anger while driving a car and end up abusing, hitting and injuring the other person , hence it is very important to have a control over your anger and emotions while driving a car .

This course contains 7 lectures , video recorded by Pradeep Aggarwal and over 30 minutes of content

This course contains -

  • Introduction to the course
  • Finding out the cause of your rage
  • Relaxation techniques
  • Anchoring And Mind Trigger Techniques To Counter Your Rage
  • Reverse Spin Technique
  • Remove Road Rage Using Visualization Technique
  • Summary Of The Course
title: Get Rid Of Your Road Rage Using NLP And Self Hypnosis
